column2: Although the people of the Underdark honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Although the people of the Underdark honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Eilistraee, goddes of dance, freedom and hunting.
Vhaeraun, god of thieves, arrogance and shadows.
Ghaunandaur, god of oozes and rebels.
Although the people of the Underdark honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Kiaransalee, goddes of necromancy and vengeance.
Selvetarm, god of warriors and slaughter.
Zinzerena, goddess of assassins and lies.
Although the people of the Underdark honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
